mapper.select: select * from HOSPITAL h join hos_dept d on h.hosp_code =d.hosp_code join member m on h.mem_email=m.mem_email where h.MEM_EMAIL= #{id}
select m.* from HOSPITAL H join RESERVATION R on H.HOSP_CODE = R.HOSP_CODE join MEMBER M on M.MEM_EMAIL = R.MEM_EMAIL where H.HOSP_CODE=#{hos_code} order by R.RES_DATE desc
select R.* from HOSPITAL H join RESERVATION R on H.HOSP_CODE = R.HOSP_CODE join MEMBER M on M.MEM_EMAIL = R.MEM_EMAIL where H.HOSP_CODE=#{hos_code} order by R.RES_DATE desc
mapper.update: update hospital set hosp_name = #{hosp_name}, weekday_open = #{weekday_open}, weekday_close= #{weekday_close}, weekend_open = #{weekend_open}, weekend_close = #{weekend_close}, lunchtime = #{lunchtime}, mem_email = #{email}, address = #{address} where hosp_code = #{hosp_code}
update reservation set approved='승인됨' where reserv_no=#{resnum}
update reservation set approved='거절됨' where reserv_no=#{resnum}
update member set mem_pwd='withdrawal' where mem_email=#{id}
